law.catch_line: Deposits Or Other Security For Proposals By Bidders
law.text: [ Text of section effective until January 1, 2013. For text effective January 1, 2013, see below.] The state treasurer may require each bidder submitting a proposal pursuant to section 53, as a condition precedent to the consideration of such bidder's proposal, to submit a good faith deposit or otherwise secure such bidder's proposal, in such manner and amount as the state treasurer shall determine to be appropriate. Chapter 29: Deposits or other security for proposals by bidders [ Text of section as recodified by 2012, 165, Sec. 112 effective January 1, 2013. See 2012, 165, Sec. 137. For text effective until January 1, 2013, see above.] The state treasurer may require each bidder submitting a proposal under section 53, as a condition precedent to the consideration of such bidder's proposal, to submit a good faith deposit or otherwise secure such bidder's proposal, in such manner and amount as the state treasurer shall determine to be appropriate.
